title: Deadly Asian floods are a preview of what's coming as climate warms, scientists say
description: Southeast Asia has been hit by unusually severe floods this year, with late storms killing more than 1,400 people and leaving hundreds missing across Indonesia, Sri Lanka, and Thailand. Scientists say the devastation reflects a warming global climate turbo-ch…
content:
HANOI, Vietnam (AP) Southeast Asia is being pummeled by unusually severe floods this year, as late-arriving storms and relentless rains wreak havoc that has caught many places off guard.
